<subject>User {UserName} has been added to a MyManuals-team</subject> <body> Congratulation {UserName}!
MyManuals provides a ubiquitos platform for publishing of non-fiction texts on all devices and for traditional print.
An author has added you to his or her team '{TeamName}' and invited to contribute. Please logon as soon as possible to confirm your membership and shares.

</body>

<subject>User {UserName} has been removed from a MyManuals-team</subject> <body> Dear {UserName}!
You was removed from team '{TeamName}' either by yourself or your team's leader.
Kind regards, your MyManuals team
</body>

<subject>User {UserName} has been removed from a MyManuals-team</subject> <body> Dear {UserName}!
You have, as a lead author, removed the user {ContributorName} from your team {TeamName}.
Kind regards, your MyManuals team
</body>
